title: After Activist’s Killing, Tensions Erupt Between France’s Far-Right and Far-Left
summary_full: The beating death of Quentin Deranque has quickly become a flashpoint between the far right and far left as France prepares for local elections next month and presidential elections next year.
summary_public: The beating death of Quentin Deranque has quickly become a flashpoint between the far right and far left as France prepares for local elections next month and presidential elections next year.

FR.label: neutral
